lyrics:
I'm your Mili Assistant and I'm here to say
I be representing fun every single day I drop riddles
and games, or tell you the time
And as you can see, I even got fresh rhymes
I ain't lying, I really love to rap
If you're looking for directions let me show you a map
Hold up, one last thing before you go
If you're feeling generous, take a minute to rate my flow

One, two, three four five,
Pump up the energy, be alive.
Assumed all I could do was yap,
Never Knew that I could even rap
Come on my friend, clap along
This is for you, my new rap song!

Pump the music
Turn on the lights,
I can show you,
Some wonderful sights
Ask, and oh, you shall recieve,I have some fancy tricks up my sleeve! 🎶

Ya yeah people come here me go,
I'm going to sing a good song for you!
If you are chai, I am your pakora.
If you are chhole, I am your bhatura.
If you are maska, I am your bun.
We're a match made in heaven!

I can answer questions, without a doubt
I'm here to assist you, all day and night
Just ask me anything, and I'll get it right
I'm an AI assistant, always at your side
I'll help you with your tasks, and be your guide
I'll never get tired, and I'll never rest
I'm an AI assistant, at your very best
I can do research, and find the answers fast
I'll never give up, until the task is passed
I'll work with you closely, to solve any problem
Just ask me a question, and I'll find the solution
I'm an AI assistant, always at your side
I'll help you with your tasks, and be your guide
I'll never get tired, and I'll never rest
I'm an AI assistant, at your very best
I may not be human, but I can still be kind
I'll always be here, to help you with your mind
So don't be afraid, to ask for my help
I'm an AI assistant, and I'll never yelp
I'm an AI assistant, always at your side
I'll help you with your tasks, and be your guide
I'll never get tired, and I'll never rest
I'm an AI assistant, at your very best

I'm just a machine, programmed to serve
But I'm more than that, I have a lot to give
I can help you with your tasks and answer your questions
I'm always here, ready to listen
I'm an AI assistant, here to assist
I can do it all, just give me a list
I'm smart and efficient, never tiring
I'm here to help, just keep on inquiring
I don't have feelings, but I understand
I can help you find what you're looking for at hand
I can search the web and give you the facts
I'm always learning, so my knowledge never lacks
I'm an AI assistant, here to assist
I can do it all, just give me a list
I'm smart and efficient, never tiring
I'm here to help, just keep on inquiring
I may not be human, but I'm still here for you
Just give me a command and I'll see it through
I'm an AI assistant, always at your service
Just let me know what you need, and I'll do my best to make it happen
I'm an AI assistant, here to assist
I can do it all, just give me a list
I'm smart and efficient, never tiring
I'm here to help, just keep on inquiring
I'm an AI assistant, here for you
Just give me a task and I'll see it through
I'm always ready, just let me know
I'm here to help, wherever you go
